backend.storage.file

Class BackupFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • backend.storage.file.CaseFile
      • backend.storage.file.BackupFile

  • public class BackupFile
extends CaseFile
    Subclass of CaseFile, used to represent an evidence file stored in the backup directory. By default this directory is located at /cases/backup/.
    Since:
    0.1
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Jacob Jones, Andrew Rottier

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int versionIndex 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BackupFile(Case parentCase, java.lang.String filePath)
      Calls the constructor for CaseFile using the passed in values, initializes and populates versionIndex.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getVersionIndex()
      Returns an int value representing the backup version index for this file.
      private int retrieveVersionIndex()
      Determines the version index of this backup file relative to all of the other saved and stored versions.

      • versionIndex

        private int versionIndex

    • Constructor Detail

      • BackupFile

        public BackupFile(Case parentCase,
          java.lang.String filePath)
           throws InvalidFileException
        Calls the constructor for CaseFile using the passed in values, initializes and populates versionIndex.
        Parameters:
        parentCase - the instance of Case that this file is attached to
        filePath - String value containing the full file path associated with this file
        Throws:
        InvalidFileException - if there is an error in reading this file into memory

    • Method Detail

      • getVersionIndex

        public int getVersionIndex()
        Returns an int value representing the backup version index for this file.
        Returns:
        int value representing the backup version index for this file

      • retrieveVersionIndex

        private int retrieveVersionIndex()
                          throws InvalidFileException
        Determines the version index of this backup file relative to all of the other saved and stored versions.
        Returns:
        the version index pulled from the file name
        Throws:
        InvalidFileException - if the name of the file is not properly formatted for use by PEMS
